desc: List of common memes/acronyms used all over the chat/internet

Unicorns.title: Unicorns are the magically weaponized form of a pony.

Jon Skeet.title: The top user on Stack Overflow, who can rep cap every day without needing to visit.

Needs more jQuery.title: When your implementation simply needs more jQuery to be better.

6 to 8 weeks.title: The time estimate given "off the top of my head" when the Stack Exchange team has only a vague idea of how long a task will take because they have little-to-no formal scheduling or even a list of tasks.

Burninated.title: Used in reference to deleting a tag from the system.

Caching.title: Don't treat this text as true, caching is to blame.
